label: commonName
comment: A common name, expressed as text, for this distinct chemical.
A common name, expressed as text, for this trade product instance.
A common name, expressed as text, for this trade product.

domainIncludes.comment: Any clearly defined substance having a defined molecular composition.
An individual trade product or batch of similar trade products produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.
Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
